note.p: Farmer. Living at Great Hale, Lincolnshire, 1861. His son, John Billiat(t) Harris (1836–96), described as ‘farmer’s son’, was farming at the Grange, Anwick, Lincolnshire, in 1861; in Shelford, Nottinghamshire, 1881.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/619/4/4/2), 1861 (RG9/2342/72/13, RG9/2345/92/1), 1881 (RG11/3383/38/10)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 February 2022)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 February 2022)
UK and Ireland, Find a grave index, 1300s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 February 2022)
